a language-independent macro processora macro processor is described which can beused with almost any source language it provides all features normally associated with a macro facility,plus the ability to make arbitrary transformations of the argument strings the program is used at thebasser computing department university of sydney sydney australia to process text for eight different compilers.cacm july 1967waite w m.ca670708 jb february 28 1978 8:35 am1358 4 15651530 4 15651531 4 15651541 4 15651565 4 15651565 4 15651565 4 15651565 4 15651703 4 15651781 4 15651781 4 15651788 4 15651824 4 15651945 4 15652036 4 15652252 4 15651162 5 1565205 5 15651358 5 15651455 5 15651530 5 15651565 5 15651565 5 15651565 5 15651781 5 15651852 5 15652034 5 1565123 6 1565196 6 1565919 6 1565984 6 1565990 6 15651007 6 15651046 6 15651131 6 15651139 6 15651140 6 15651149 6 15651198 6 15651215 6 15651223 6 15651231 6 15651265 6 15651303 6 15651323 6 15651358 6 15651366 6 15651421 6 15651455 6 15651460 6 15651462 6 15651463 6 15651467 6 15651468 6 15651477 6 15651491 6 15651496 6 15651531 6 15651535 6 15651565 6 15651565 6 15651565 6 15651565 6 15651601 6 15651602 6 15651613 6 15651614 6 15651626 6 15651641 6 15651787 6 15651788 6 1565205 6 1565224 6 15651852 6 1565249 6 1565288 6 15651926 6 15651947 6 1565316 6 1565381 6 1565398 6 156511 6 1565404 6 1565410 6 1565463 6 1565464 6 1565483 6 15653184 6 15653188 6 1565584 6 1565600 6 1565680 6 1565691 6 1565763 6 1565799 6 1565
